bill.summary: This resolution disapproves of the Central Business District Tolling Program of New York City and strongly recommends (1) New York conduct an economic impact report on the program, and (2) that relevant federal agencies and New York halt the program's implementation. The tolling program, also known as congestion pricing, will charge drivers a toll to enter an area designated as Manhattan's central business district.
